array.text:
*<10/25(수) 오후5시 BK21 x ERC 세미나, 이문태 교수, University of Illinois Chicago>*

*일시*: 2023년 10월 25일(수), 오후 5시
*장소*: 서울대학교 43-2동 B102호

*Speaker*: 이문태 교수, University of Illinois Chicago / LG AI Research
*Title*: The Art of Generative AI: Text, Code, and Beyond

*Abstract*:
Large Language Models (LLMs) have transformed Natural Language Processing and the wider spectrum of Artificial Intelligence. Relying on their capability to understand extensive contexts, the groundbreaking innovation lies in tackling multiple tasks by a single formalism: generating contextually coherent and creatively diverse subsequent outputs. This talk overviews recent progress in large language modeling and my journey into the realm of generative AI. Highlighting my focuses on both text and code modalities, the talk delves into my recent research on retrieval-augmented text generation and multilingual code completions. Furthermore, the presentation outlines my ongoing research trajectory on planning, reasoning, aligning, and prospective steps toward self-learning.

*Bio*:
Moontae Lee leads the Advanced Machine Learning Laboratory in Seoul at LG AI Research. Concurrently he is an assistant professor of Information and Decision Sciences at the University of Illinois Chicago. Prior to leading LG AI Research, he was invited to be a visiting scholar at Microsoft Research (MSR) and later extended as a consulting professor for the Deep Learning Group at MSR Redmond. Moontae’s research aims to develop innovative AI models and algorithms. While designing Large Language Models and Deep Generative Models are his primary focuses, his curiosity also spans to Human-AI interactions, aiming to build interactive platforms that foster intellectual, insightful, and inspirational communications.

*<2023학년도 2학기 대학원생 생활지원장학금 선발 결과 알림>*

○ 선발자에게 SNU 이메일로 개별 알림(탈락자는 별도 알림 없음)
○ 장학금 지급(예정)일: 매월 25일 / ※ 9월분 및 10월분 지급: 2023. 10. 25.(수)
    1) 생활지원장학생에게“*수혜 후기 보고서"* 제출 의무*(신설)*
      -수혜후기보고서를 행정실로 *2023.12.4.(월)*까지  제출
    2) 장학금 지급 중단 사유(휴학 등 학적변동), 생활비성 중복 수혜를 금지하는 타 장학금 수혜시 행정실로 즉시 통보
